## ModalResolveCallback type

callback as one passed to ModalStore `onPop`

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ModalResolveCallback<Component extends ModalComponentBase = ModalComponentBase> = (
	resolved: ModalResolved<Component>,
) => void;
```
